validity_formulas.specification:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="ASCII"?>
<contextValidity:HyValidityModel xmi:version="2.0" xmlns:xmi="http://www.omg.org/XMI" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:context="http://hyvar-project.eu/feature/context/1.0" xmlns:contextValidity="http://hyvar-project.eu/context/validity/1.0" xmlns:dataValues="http://hyvar-project.eu/feature/dataValues/1.0" xmlns:expression="http://hyvar-project.eu/feature/expression/1.0">
  <validityFormulas xsi:type="contextValidity:HyFeatureValidityFormula">
    <validityFormula xsi:type="expression:HyEqualExpression">
      <operand1 xsi:type="expression:HyContextInformationReferenceExpression">
        <contextInformation xsi:type="context:HyContextualInformationEnum" href="HyVarUseCaseReview.hycontextmodel#GPS_Positions"/>
      </operand1>
      <operand2 xsi:type="expression:HyValueExpression">
        <value xsi:type="dataValues:HyEnumValue">
          <enumLiteral href="HyVarUseCaseReview.hycontextmodel#//@enums.0/@literals.1"/>
          <enum href="HyVarUseCaseReview.hycontextmodel#GPS_Position_enum"/>
        </value>
      </operand2>
    </validityFormula>
    <feature href="HyVarUseCaseReview.hyfeature#//@features.5"/>
  </validityFormulas>
</contextValidity:HyValidityModel>

context_model.specification:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="ASCII"?>
<context:HyContextModel xmi:version="2.0" xmlns:xmi="http://www.omg.org/XMI" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:context="http://hyvar-project.eu/feature/context/1.0">
  <contextualInformations xsi:type="context:HyContextualInformationEnum" id="GPS_Positions" enumType="GPS_Position_enum"/>
  <enums id="GPS_Position_enum">
    <literals name="GPS_Position_Russia"/>
    <literals name="GPS_Position_Europe" value="1"/>
  </enums>
</context:HyContextModel>

feature_model.specification:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="ASCII"?>
<feature:HyFeatureModel xmi:version="2.0" xmlns:xmi="http://www.omg.org/XMI" xmlns:feature="http://hyvar-project.eu/feature/1.0">
  <rootFeature feature="//@features.0"/>
  <features>
    <cardinality minCardinality="1" maxCardinality="1"/>
    <names name="EmergencyCall"/>
    <parentOf childGroup="//@groups.0"/>
  </features>
  <features groupMembership="//@groups.0/@parentOf.0">
    <cardinality minCardinality="1" maxCardinality="1"/>
    <names name="Base"/>
    <parentOf childGroup="//@groups.1"/>
  </features>
  <features groupMembership="//@groups.0/@parentOf.0">
    <cardinality minCardinality="1" maxCardinality="1"/>
    <names name="Languages"/>
    <parentOf childGroup="//@groups.2"/>
  </features>
  <features groupMembership="//@groups.0/@parentOf.0">
    <cardinality minCardinality="1" maxCardinality="1"/>
    <names name="GNSS"/>
    <parentOf childGroup="//@groups.3"/>
  </features>
  <features groupMembership="//@groups.0/@parentOf.0">
    <cardinality maxCardinality="1"/>
    <names name="Diagnostic"/>
  </features>
  <features groupMembership="//@groups.1/@parentOf.0">
    <cardinality maxCardinality="1"/>
    <names name="eCall"/>
  </features>
  <features groupMembership="//@groups.1/@parentOf.0">
    <cardinality maxCardinality="1"/>
    <names name="EraGlonass"/>
  </features>
  <features groupMembership="//@groups.2/@parentOf.0">
    <cardinality maxCardinality="1"/>
    <names name="Russian"/>
  </features>
  <features groupMembership="//@groups.2/@parentOf.0">
    <cardinality maxCardinality="1"/>
    <names name="EU_Languages"/>
  </features>
  <features groupMembership="//@groups.3/@parentOf.0">
    <cardinality maxCardinality="1"/>
    <names name="GPS"/>
  </features>
  <features groupMembership="//@groups.3/@parentOf.0">
    <cardinality maxCardinality="1"/>
    <names name="Glonass"/>
  </features>
  <groups childOf="//@features.0/@parentOf.0">
    <cardinality minCardinality="3" maxCardinality="4"/>
    <parentOf features="//@features.1 //@features.2 //@features.3 //@features.4"/>
  </groups>
  <groups childOf="//@features.1/@parentOf.0">
    <cardinality minCardinality="1" maxCardinality="1"/>
    <parentOf features="//@features.5 //@features.6"/>
  </groups>
  <groups childOf="//@features.2/@parentOf.0">
    <cardinality minCardinality="1" maxCardinality="1"/>
    <parentOf features="//@features.7 //@features.8"/>
  </groups>
  <groups childOf="//@features.3/@parentOf.0">
    <cardinality minCardinality="1" maxCardinality="2"/>
    <parentOf features="//@features.9 //@features.10"/>
  </groups>
</feature:HyFeatureModel>
